data.name: HMM Metal Pass Premium Season 3 + 20 Levels
data.detailed_description:
Metal Pass

Metal Pass is the progression system where the players have access to weekly challenges and amazing in-game rewards. This seasonal journey is the path to level your account up and get over 90 items by winning the challenges!

Premium

The Metal Pass Premium ensures that you receive twice as many rewards per level, and also makes you progress faster on the season, achieving the best items.

Get 20 levels instantly

With this DLC, you'll get access to the current season Premium rewards and instantly bump 20 levels, which also means 20 levels worth of rewards for your account immediately!

3rd Season Rewards

The season includes more than 90 rewards total, and with the Premium, you will also get:
  • A Heavy Metal model for Rampage and Little Monster
  • New Metal Legend Models for Photon and Full Metal Judge
  • New Rockstar Model for Killer J.
  • New Idol Models for Stargazer and Icebringer
  • Lots of new Sprays
  • New thematic Visual Effects for the matches
  • 5 New Avatar Portraits

data.short_description: The Metal Pass Premium ensures that you receive twice as many rewards per level, and also makes you progress faster on the season, achieving the best items. This version also bump your Metal Pass level 20 levels instantly!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card with at least 512 MB video ram and Shader Model 3.0 support. (NVIDIA GT 710, AMD Radeon R5 240)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card with 1024 MB+ video ram and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7750)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
